item.title: My Productivity Story - Part 2
item.description: Last week, I published a post about my productivity story and some of the methodologies I used in University and the first years of my career. I finished the blog with the mix of GTD and MIT (Most Important Task) method setup that I had for a while. It was a bit painful to update the three most important tasks for each context each time I completed a task. So, I decided to stop doing it.
